title: C#
description: C# is a modern, object-oriented, strongly typed, general-purpose programming language developed by Microsoft. It is popular for developing Windows, web, and mobile applications, integrating well with the .NET platform.

items.title: C# Tutorial - Tutorialspoint
items.description: Explore tutorials and detailed references for C#, covering fundamental concepts, object-oriented programming, LINQ, and more.

items.title: C# - W3schools
items.description: Learn the fundamentals of the C# language with this interactive and easy-to-follow online tutorial.
